surepy.analysis.nearest_neighbor module¶

This module provides methods for nearest-neighbor analysis.

class surepy.analysis.nearest_neighbor.Nearest_neighbor_distances(data, k=1, other_data=None)[source]¶

Bases: surepy.analysis.analysis.Analysis

Compute the k-nearest-neighbor distances within data or between data and other_data.

Parameters: :param data (Selection object): Selection with localizations for which a nearest neighbor is computed. :param k (int): the kth neirest neighbor is computed. :param other_data (Selection object): Selection with localizations from which a nearest neighbor is taken.

Attributes: :cvar count (int): a counter for counting instantiations :var data (Selection object): reference to the Selection object specified as input data. :var parameter (dict): a dictionary with all settings for the current computation. :var results (np.array): an array with the nearest neighbor distance for each localization in data.

_fit_to_csr_distribution(x_histo, y_histo)[source]¶

Fit results to analytical function for complete spatial randomness.

compute_results(data, k=1, other_data=None)[source]¶

Compute the k-nearest-neighbor Euclidean distances for data or between data and other_data.

Parameters:
  • (Selection object) (other_data) – Selection with localizations for which a nearest neighbor is computed.
  • (int) (k) – the kth neirest neighbor is computed.
  • (Selection object) – Selection with localizations from which a nearest neighbor is taken.
Return np.array:
 

the nearest neighbor distances
count = 0¶

Provide matplotlib axes showing results.

Parameters:

  • (bool) (normed) –
surepy.analysis.nearest_neighbor.k_nearest_neighbor(points, k=1, other_points=None)[source]¶

k_nearest_neighbor(points, k = 1, other_points = None) computes nearest neighbor distances.

surepy.analysis.nearest_neighbor.pdf_nnDistances_csr_2D(x, density)[source]¶

probability density function for nearest-neighbor distances of points distributed in 2D at complete spatial randomness.

Parameters:
  • (float) (density) – distance
  • (float) – density of points

:return probability density function :rtype float

surepy.analysis.nearest_neighbor.pdf_nnDistances_csr_3D(x, density)[source]¶

probability density function for nearest-neighbor distances of points distributed in 3D at complete spatial randomness.

Parameters:
  • (float) (density) – distance
  • (float) – density of points

:return probability density function :rtype float
